@notice Get current total (type-weighted) weight

add_gauge(address,int128).notice: Add gauge `addr` of type `gauge_type` with weight `weight`

params.addr: Address to have ownership transferred to

gauge_relative_weight(address).notice: Get Gauge relative weight (not more than 1.0) normalized to 1e18 (e.g. 1.0 == 1e18). Inflation which will be received by it is inflation_rate * relative_weight / 1e18

params.time: Relative weight at the specified timestamp in the past or present

returns._0: Value of relative weight normalized to 1e18
